ability.name: Melee Combat against Spellcasters
ability.description: You have practiced techniques in melee combat against spellcasters, gaining the following benefits: 1. When a creature within 5 feet of you casts a spell, you can use your reaction to make a melee weapon attack against that creature. 2. When you damage a creature that is concentrating on a spell, that creature has disadvantage on the saving throw it makes to maintain its concentration. 3. You have advantage on saving throws against spells cast by creatures within 5 feet of you.
